author: jshlee
body:
For slice test and full sim unpacking and packing is required.
Packer - GEMDigiToRawModule
Unpacker - GEMRawToDigiModule
DQM/GEM
CondCore/GEMPlugins
CondFormats/GEMObjects
CondFormats/DataRecord
CondTools/GEM
EventFilter/GEMRawToDigi

Talks

https://indico.cern.ch/event/675328/contributions/2763616/attachments/1547638/2430150/171024_Hyunyong_Run304810_TK_v4c.pdf

me0 packing and unpacking not yet in std seq due to me0 using pesudo digitiser
need to update configs with channel mapping from DB, currently using dummy mapping

@slava77 @kpedro88 @hyunyong
title: Packing and Unpacking + DQM for GEM and ME0
